TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChartArea3DStyle extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理立體 (3D) 圖表區域的顯示屬性。

span.span: Manages the display attributes for three-dimensional (3D) chart areas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供 3D 圖表區域的樣式，並使用公開屬性。This class provides the styles for 3D chart areas, and is exposed using the property. 若要啟用 3D 圖表區域，將屬性設`true`。To enable 3D for a chart area, set the property to `true`. 這會導致套用至所有的資料數列在圖表區域中繪製 3D。This causes 3D to be applied to all data series drawn in a chart area. 可以藉由設定顯示的圖表區域等角投影屬性設`true`，這是預設值。An isometric projection of a chart area can be displayed by setting the property to `true`, which is the default. 等的檢視不會實際 3D，因為旋轉的角度顯示可能不符合實際垂直和水平座標軸的旋轉角度。Isometric views are not actually 3D, because the displayed angles of rotation may not match the actual angles of rotation around the vertical and horizontal axes. 使用控制實際的角度和屬性，分別。The actual angles are controlled using the and properties, respectively. 如需等角投影的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節屬性。For more information about isometric projections, see the Remarks section of the property. 您也可以使用這個類別，以便：You can also use this class to: - 叢集列和資料行圖表資料數列使用屬性。Cluster bar and column chart data series using the property. - 控制使用的光源效果屬性。Control the lighting effects using the property. - 設定使用的圖表區域牆的寬度屬性。Set the width of chart area walls using the property. - 設定的檢視方塊與量屬性。Set the amount of perspective with the property. - 控制資料點和使用的資料列之間的距離的深度和屬性，分別。Control the depth of data points and the distance between data rows using the and properties, respectively. - 旋轉圖表區域中，使用和屬性。Rotate a chart area using the and properties. 若要使用的 3D 點的座標，使用類別。To work with coordinates of 3D points, use the class. 當圖表設定為 3D 時，下列的圖表功能不是有效的：When a chart is set to 3D, the following chart features are not valid: - 刻度斷層Scale breaks - 漸層Gradients - 捲動和縮放Scrolling and zooming

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出旗標是否會開啟或關閉圖表區的 3D。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the flag toggles the 3D on and off for a chart area.

value.span: 以 3D 顯示圖表區域則為 ，否則為 ，表示以 2D 顯示圖表區域。

span.span: the chart area is displayed using 3D, if the chart area is displayed in 2D.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 切換 3d 顯示圖表區域。Toggles the three-dimensional display of a chart area.

span.span: An that represents the angle of rotation around the horizontal axes for 3D chart areas.

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，決定是否以叢集方式處理橫條圖或直條圖的資料數列，意即沿著不同資料列顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether data series for a bar or column chart are clustered; that is, displayed along distinct rows.

value.span: 如果要以叢集方式處理橫條圖或直條圖的資料數列，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if data series for a bar or column chart are clustered; otherwise, .

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，決定是否使用等角投影顯示圖表區域。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether a chart area is displayed using an isometric projection.

value.span: 如果使用等角投影顯示圖表區域，為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the chart area is displayed using an isometric projection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等的檢視不會實際 3D，因為旋轉的角度顯示可能不符合實際垂直和水平座標軸的旋轉角度。Isometric views are not actually 3D, because the displayed angles of rotation may not match the actual angles of rotation around the vertical and horizontal axes. 使用控制實際的角度和屬性，分別。The actual angles are controlled using the and properties, respectively. 請注意下列有關等角投影的重點：Note the following points concerning isometric projection: - 它不是 「 真實 」 的 3D。It is not "real" 3D. 也就是說，座標軸的旋轉角度不會使用，則為 true 的旋轉角度。That is, the angle of rotation around axes doesn't use true rotational angles. - 它很適合用於顯示 3D 圖表，有一些深度。It is ideal for displaying 3D charts with some depth. - 如果您的應用程式可讓使用者能夠旋轉圖表，不會順利進行的旋轉。If your application allows end-users to rotate the charts, the rotation will not be smooth. 在此情況下，不建議使用等角的檢視。In this case, using isometric views is not recommended. - 使用等角投影，不支援檢視方塊。With isometric projection, perspective is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LightStyle LightStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LightStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LightStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 3D 圖表區域的光源類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of lighting for a 3D chart area.
A enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Perspective { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Perspective : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 3D 圖表區域的透視百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the percent of perspective for a 3D chart area.

value.span: 值，表示 3D 圖表區域的透視百分比。

span.span: An value that represents the percent of perspective for a 3D chart area.

value.span: 允許範圍為百分之 0 到 100，預設值為百分之 0。

span.span: The allowable range is 0-100 percent, and the default is zero (0) percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遠近景深投射的任何一組不投影平面平行的平行線的聚合成消失點。A perspective projection of any set of parallel lines that are not parallel to the projection plane converges to a vanishing point. 如果您設定屬性，屬性會自動設為`false`，因為這些屬性互斥。If you set the property, the property will be automatically set to `false`, because these properties are mutually exclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PointDepth { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PointDepth : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 3D 圖表區域中顯示的資料點深度。

span.span: Gets or sets the depth of data points displayed in a 3D chart area.
An value that represents the depth of data points.

value.span: 允許的範圍介於百分比 0 和 1000 之間。

span.span: The allowable range is 0-1000 percent.
The default is 100 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會決定資料點深度，以資料點寬度的百分比表示。This property determines the depth of data points, and is represented as a percentage of the data point width. 屬性可以套用至橫條圖、 資料行的深度折線圖、 圓形圖和曲線的圖表資料點。The property can be applied to the depth of bar, column, line, pie and spline chart data points only. 如果您設定這個屬性不能有其 「 延展 」 的點深度其他圖表類型 （例如，泡泡圖和點圖） 時，它將會保留額外的空間資料點，但不是會提高其深度。If you set this property for other chart types (for example, bubble and point charts) that cannot have their point depths "stretched", it will reserve extra space for the data points, but will not increase their depth. 您也可以設定為等角投影顯示圖表屬性設`true`，這是預設值。You can display the chart as an isometric projection by setting the property to `true`, which is the default value. 這會導致多於或少於這個屬性，根據所顯示的圖表所設定的百分比要顯示的點深度。This will cause the point depth to appear to be more or less than the percentage set by this property, depending on the chart being displayed. 若要控制資料列之間的間距，請使用屬性。To control the spacing between rows of data, use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PointGapDepth { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PointGapDepth : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 3D 圖表區域中數列之間的距離。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between series rows in a 3D chart area.

value.span: 值，表示 3D 圖表區域中資料列 (即資料數列) 之間的距離。

span.span: An value that represents the distance between data rows (that is, the data series) in the 3D chart area.

value.span: 允許範圍為百分之 0 到 1000，預設值為百分之 100。

span.span: The allowable range is 0-1000 percent, and the default is 100 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定資料列，以對應至資料數列的每個資料列之間的距離。This property determines the distance between data rows, with each row corresponding to a data series. 度量單位是以百分比表示的一個資料列中的資料點之間的距離。The unit of measurement is expressed as a percentage of the distance between data points in one row. 變更資料行或橫條圖使用的資料行] 及 [橫條圖類型之間的差距`PointWidth`自訂屬性會影響屬性值。Changing the gap between columns or bars for column and bar chart types using the `PointWidth` custom property will affect the property value. 設定屬性設`true`（預設值） 以作為等角投影顯示圖表。Set the property to `true` (the default value) to display the chart as an isometric projection. 這會導致多於或少於這個屬性，根據所顯示的圖表所設定的百分比要顯示的點間隙深度。This will cause the point gap depth to appear to be more or less than the percentage set by this property, depending on the chart being displayed. 若要控制資料點的深度，請使用屬性。To control the depth of data points, use the property.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 3D 圖表區域垂直座標軸的旋轉角度。

span.span: Gets or sets the angle of rotation around the vertical axes for 3D chart areas.

value.span: 值，表示 3D 圖表區域垂直座標軸的旋轉角度。

span.span: An value that represents the angle of rotation around the vertical axes for 3D chart areas.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int WallWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.WallWidth : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於 3D 圖表區域中的背景牆寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the walls displayed in a 3D chart area.

value.span: 值，表示顯示於 3D 圖表區域中背景牆的寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: An value that represents the width, in pixels, of the walls displayed in a 3D chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性決定的背景牆寬度 （例如，背景牆、 側邊牆等等） 顯示於 3D 圖表區域中。This property determines the width of the walls (for example, the back wall, side walls, and so forth) that are displayed in 3D chart areas. 允許的範圍是 0 到 30 像素為單位。The allowable range is 0-30 pixels.
